sentences.en: He is an animal trainer for the circus.
He was able to serve his apprenticeship as a trainer with Eddie Futch.
sentences.cn: 他当时师从埃迪·富齐学当拳击教练员。

sentences.en: He works out every morning with his personal trainer.
sentences.cn: 每天早上他都和私人教练一起锻炼.

sentences.en: Her trainer paced her on a motorcar following her slowly.
sentences.cn: 她的教练骑着一辆摩托慢慢跟随着她为她测步速.

sentences.en: Her trainer was even more gloomy about the prospects for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 她的教练对英国网球的前景甚至更为悲观.

sentences.en: How long has Yvonne been working as a personal trainer?
sentences.cn: 伊冯做私人教练多久了?

sentences.en: Our trainer had a strong influence on the team.
sentences.cn: 我们的教练对这个队的影响很大.

sentences.en: She knew how fast she was running, because her trainer was pacing her on a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 她知道她当时跑得多快, 因为她的教练骑着自行车在为她定步速.

sentences.en: She went to the gym with her trainer.
sentences.cn: 她和她的教练一起去了健身房。

sentences.en: She's been working as a personal trainer for two years.
sentences.cn: 她做私人教练有两年了.

sentences.en: That trainer knows how to get results from his horses.
sentences.cn: 那个驯马师掌握行之有效的驯马技巧.

sentences.en: The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.
sentences.cn: 这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。

sentences.en: The horse made a winning start for his new trainer.
sentences.cn: 这匹马为它的新驯马师开了个好头。

sentences.en: The tennis star has parted company with his Austrian trainer.
sentences.cn: 这位网球明星与他的奥地利教练分道扬镳。

sentences.en: The trainer is walking his dogs.
sentences.cn: 那位驯兽人正在遛他的狗.

sentences.en: When our trainer stopped speaking, there were a few dutiful cheers.
sentences.cn: 当我们的教练说完的时候, 底下是一些例行的欢乐呼声.

words.tran_cn: 培训；训练过的，受过培训的
练习生，实习生；受训者；新兵；训练中的动物
助理教练；[劳经]训练员；驯马师；飞行练习器

trans.tran_en: someone who trains people or animals for sport or work
